GSD.description:
KVM: MMU: shadow nested paging does not have PKU

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.7 by commit 87d9c628be264a4d2dbb9eb0e7d629aef8b66339. For more details please see the references link.
